titleStmt.title: Die Sabbathi, 16 Novemb. 1644 an ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the freeing and discharging of all rents and revenues (belonging to the hospitalls of Saint Bartholomew, Bridewell, Saint Thomas, and Bethlem) from any assessments, taxes and charges whatsoever.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
